fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Place an eye on a player permanently at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players with an eye on them cannot target players they have visited at any point during the game. If they are forced to target a player they have already targeted, their ability will have no effect.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the good faction loses the game.
